crystals.title: Tangible Energy
crystals.hint: Crystal energy is mostly an ethereal, intagible force. However, when concentrated, it may have a physical manifestation.
crystals.reveal: Sure enough, you have found places where crystal energy has coalesced and formed regular, glassy formations, ones that radiate the effects of their element.

casting.title: Fabrication
casting.hint: Surely the wooden crafting table is not sufficient to do all your crafting.
casting.reveal: As expected, to perform feats more complex than making a wooden box to store your items, you needed to create a special more magically-sound table.

dyetree.title: Technicolor Trees
dyetree.hint: These trees seem to come in all sorts of colors; you wonder if there is something special about them.
dyetree.reveal: Well, they seem to drop berries and dyes of their color, so that has to count for something...

multiblock.title: More Complex Crafting
multiblock.hint: The more complex ideas you have could not possibly be pulled off with only nine constituent items...
multiblock.reveal: Sure enough, the 5x5 afforded by the item stands is what you need.

runeuse.title: Weak Magical Foci
runeuse.hint: You may not be able to harness the power of the pylons yet, but these may make a milder alternative.
runeuse.reveal: That they do, allowing you to make items more infused with energy than simple stone.

pylon.title: Energy Beacons
pylon.hint: Glowing and radiant, what are these?
pylon.reveal: Some sort of an energy beacon...probably a good idea to remember that.

link.title: Top-tier Crafting
link.hint: Finally you can harness the pylons, but how to put it to use?
link.reveal: Channeling all that energy directly into the table has allowed you to construct devices from your wildest imagination.

charge.title: Energy Internalization
charge.hint: If the pylons and trees can store energy, maybe you can too...
charge.reveal: Turns out you can, though the acquisition process is more dangerous than is enjoyable.

ability.title: Personal Enhancement
ability.hint: Machines you can accelerate. Tools you can enchant. Yourself?
ability.reveal: A new set of rituals has given you abilities of great utility.

rainbowleaf.title: Magical Trees
rainbowleaf.hint: Trees in various colors were one thing. But this?
rainbowleaf.reveal: The raw magic energy in this tree is palpable, not to mention behind the impressive visual display.

chroma.title: Magic Liquid
chroma.hint: The liquid is pulsing and throbbing with raw magical energy. You wonder what its effects are...
chroma.reveal: Stepping in it yourself seemed to do little - though you do feel a bit rejuvenated - but its power to enrich materials is not insignificant.

shock.title: Damaging Discharge
shock.reveal: If your idea of "friendly" is a discharge to the face...

nether.title: The Evil Realm
nether.hint: You need some other way below that unyielding rock...
nether.reveal: So those stories of obsidian portals leading to a fiery nightmare are true...

end.title: The Alien Realm
end.hint: Surely nothing could be more alien than that land of lava, glowing stalactites, and flying jellyfish...

twilight.title: The Forested Realm
twilight.hint: Legends tell of a different plane, covered in thick forests, with giant towers and buried mazes.
twilight.reveal: Not only does this realm exist, but it teems with unique creatures and is plentiful with treasure.

bedrock.title: World Floor
bedrock.hint: Is it possible to dig too deep?
bedrock.reveal: Maybe, but that layer of rock below seems impenetrable.

ocean.title: Ocean Temples
ocean.hint: Stories abound of strange structures left in the deepest parts of the ocean.
ocean.reveal: True stories, it seems. If only they warned of the danger...

die.title: Painful Loss
die.hint: You lose your items when you die; what happens to your knowledge?

allcolors.title: Elemental Awareness
allcolors.hint: Red, Green, Blue, Orange, how many are there?
allcolors.reveal: You have identified sixteen, each with a unique color and symbolic icon.

repeater.title: Broadcasting
repeater.hint: Unless you set up dangerously close to a pylon, there does not seem to be a way to use them, as their range is too limited.
repeater.reveal: These refractors of a sort seem to be able to reconcentrate and repeat the signal.
